title: [BUG] Unable to load attached image

comments.author: bucheronbanlieusard
comments.body:
Very interesting fact that Chrome isn't able to load it. I have more than one of these images, doesn't seem to be just a corrupted image.

Use Save link as... to download the picture and to open it.

comments.author: themcoo
comments.body: This is not a jpg file, this is HEIC file, which isn't supported. (e.g. In windows it's not supported without 3rd party codecs/software).
